# width

**Instance Property**

The width, in pixels, of the morphological structuring element.

## Declaration

```swift
var width: Float { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value is rounded to the nearest odd integer.

## Instance Properties

- **height**: The height, in pixels, of the morphological structuring element.
- **inputImage**: The image to use as an input image.
